statements: SELECT message_id, user_id, message, timestamp FROM ConversationalData;
SELECT user_id, message, timestamp FROM ConversationalData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConversationalData WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT message_id, user_id, message FROM ConversationalData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT user_id, message FROM ConversationalData WHERE message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConversationalData;
SELECT message_id, message, timestamp FROM ConversationalData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM ConversationalData WHERE message LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(message_id) AS message_count FROM ConversationalData GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(message_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM ConversationalData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, message FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT response_id, conversation_id, bot_id, response_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_responses WHERE bot_id = 2;
SELECT message FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, message FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE message LIKE '%help%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(conversation_id) AS conversation_count FROM chatbot_conversations GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, message FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT response_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_responses WHERE bot_id = 456 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations c INNER JOIN chatbot_responses r ON c.conversation_id = r.conversation_id WHERE c.user_id = 789 AND r.bot_id = 123 ORDER BY c.timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbots;
SELECT id, name FROM chatbots ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT chatbot_id, conversation_text FROM conversations WHERE chatbot_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(trained_at) FROM training_data;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE trained_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM chatbots ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, training_text, trained_at FROM training_data WHERE chatbot_id = 3;
SELECT chatbot_id, conversation_text, timestamp FROM conversations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY chatbot_id ASC;
SELECT chatbot_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_timestamp FROM conversations GROUP BY chatbot_id;
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM chatbots WHERE name LIKE '%bot%' AND created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM training_data ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT conversation_text, conversation_type FROM training_data WHERE id = 4;
SELECT bot_name, bot_description FROM chatbots WHERE bot_id = 3;
SELECT training_accuracy FROM chatbot_training WHERE bot_id = 2 ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT bot_id, total_conversations, successful_conversations, failed_conversations FROM bot_performance WHERE bot_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_data ORDER BY date_added DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT bot_name, bot_description FROM chatbots WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT training_id, training_accuracy FROM chatbot_training WHERE training_accuracy >= 0.8 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT bot_id, total_conversations, successful_conversations, failed_conversations FROM bot_performance WHERE total_conversations > 100;
SELECT conversation_text FROM training_data WHERE conversation_type = 'sales' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT chatbot_id, chatbot_name FROM TrainingChatbots WHERE chatbot_id = 1
SELECT message, timestamp FROM Conversations WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT response_text FROM Responses WHERE intent_id = 3
SELECT chatbot_name, training_data FROM TrainingChatbots WHERE chatbot_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT intent_name, intent_description FROM Intents WHERE intent_id = 3;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM Conversations WHERE chatbot_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT response_text FROM Responses WHERE intent_id = 4;
